composites.intro: Our modern composite repair systems are extremely versatile, adaptable and reliable. They have many impressive capabilities that make them an attractive alternative to traditional repair or replacement methods.

noDownTime.label: No Down Time
noDownTime.description: In most cases composites can be installed with no downtime or depressurisation and can be designed as a permanent repair, saving the platform a lot of money.

noHotWork.label: No Hot Work
noHotWork.description: In piping or infrastructure welding repairs, costs associated with hot work can be tremendous and generate their own numerous safety concerns. Composite repairs require no hot work whatsoever.

extensivelyTested.label: Extensively Tested
extensivelyTested.description: Our engineered composite systems are in compliance with to validated to the following industry standards:ASME PCC-2, ISO/TS 24817, DNV Type Approval.

corrosionResistent.label: Corrosion Resistent
corrosionResistent.description: The impermeability and high adhesion level of our 100% solids epoxy resin creates the containment barrier, arresting corrosion immediately.

pipingCompatibility.label: Compatible with all Piping
pipingCompatibility.description: Compatible with Aluminium, GRE, Carbon Steel, PVC, Cast Iron, Polyethylene, Concrete, Polypropylene, Copper, Stainless Steel, Fibreglass, Titanium and many other materials.

economical.label: Economical
economical.description: As a repair or reinforcement, composites can cost much less to install when compared to traditional welded sleeve or replacement methods.
